pages.text:
Events in Tampa Bay
Unlimited Visits. Unbeatable Benefits. Become an Annual Pass Member Today.
Get admission for 12 months with one of our Annual Passes and choose from a variety of benefits such as free parking, tickets for guests, and discounts on dining & merchandise. Plus, don't forget about all of the new adventures planned for 2025, like thrilling new attractions, new events with a variety of flavorful foods and entertainment, world-class concerts and so much more! Click here to learn more about how you can start enjoying all the benefits of membership!
Buy an Annual Pass
2025 Tampa Bay Events
Howl-O-Scream
Select Nights, Sept. 5 - Nov. 1
Tampa’s premier Halloween event returns earlier than ever with new frights & scares.
This is a separately ticketed event.
Learn More
Kandy's Sweetacular Celebration
Saturdays & Sundays, Sept. 6 - Oct. 26
Celebrate Halloween with trick-or-treating and more during Busch Gardens’ Kandy's Sweetacular Celebration event.
Learn More
Pin Trading Weekend
September 27, 2025 | 3 PM - 5 PM
Trade and explore new and rare pins during a special pin trading event.
Learn More
Halloween at Sesame Street Safari of Fun
Saturdays & Sundays, Oct. 4 - 26
Be sure to stop by the Sesame Street Safari of Fun each Saturday & Sunday in October for a special limited-time Halloween Show, festive meet-and-greets with your favorite furry friends in their Halloween costumes and Halloween Dance Parties.
Learn More
Christmas Town
Nov. 14 - Jan. 5, 2026
Celebrate the holidays with twinkling lights of every color, festive shows, and holiday-inspired culinary delights.
Guy Harvey Weekend
Dec. 12 & 13
Join Guy Harvey in-person at Busch Gardens Tampa Bay for meet-and-greets, autographs & more.
2026 Tampa Bay Events
Real Music Series
Busch Gardens Tampa Bay's longest running concert series returns with all-new music performances.
Mardi Gras
Let the good times roll with food, cocktails, entertainment and live music – Mardi Gras style!
Kids' Weekends
Join Elmo, Cookie Monster, Abby Cadabby & all of your Sesame Street® Friends for fun-filled weekends.
Food & Wine Festival
All-new culinary creations influenced by vibrant spices and bold flavors including an exciting lineup of musical acts on select Friday, Saturday & Sunday's.
Summer Nights
Stay Longer. Play Later! Celebrate all summer long with the ultimate evening thrills that light up the park with extended hours, non-stop dazzling entertainment and special summer eats & treats!
Bier Fest Brews & BBQ
Sip and savor seasonal brew offerings and new beer-inspired recipes at Bier Fest Brews & BBQ.
Kandy's Sweetacular Celebration
Celebrate Halloween with trick-or-treating and more during Busch Gardens’ Kandy's Sweetacular Celebration event.
Howl-O-Scream
Tampa’s premier Halloween event returns earlier than ever with new frights & scares.
This is a separately ticketed event.
Christmas Town
Nov. 14 - Jan. 5, 2026
Celebrate the holidays with twinkling lights of every color, festive shows, and holiday-inspired culinary delights.
Enhance your event experience!
Download our FREE app to enhance your event experience - view showtimes, purchase upgrades, and more!
Events at Busch Gardens Tampa Bay FAQs
How can I purchase event tickets at Busch Gardens Tampa Bay?
Many events are included in regular park admission or with
M
embership
.
Learn about the various ticket options for our
special events
, including online purchases, package
deals, and any available discounts
.
If I do not like rollercoasters, what other events are at Busch Gardens Tampa Bay?
Throughout the year, we host a variety of seasonal festivities such as Food and Wine that include concerts, Howl-O-Scream during Halloween, and the Christmas Town celebration.
Book a Serengeti Safari, dine at
the Serengeti Overlook and shop at more than a dozen unique boutiques and specialty shops. Catch a family-friendly show that is fun for everyone
.
What fun events are going on in Tampa Bay?
Many seasonal events happen at
Busch Gardens Tampa Bay
year-round. During the holidays, you can visit the park and experience the magic of Christmas Town; during the summer, enjoy special concerts, fireworks
displays
, food festivals, and so much more. Most of the events are included in regular park admission. Check the Busch Gardens
Events page
and
Event Calendar
for more information
.
What is the best event in Tampa Bay to take small children
If you visit Tampa Bay with small children, you will enjoy visiting Busch Gardens. There are events that are kid-friendly. From the Serengeti Safari for children 5 or older to Sesame Street Safari of Fun, there are many family-friendly rides, water activities, play areas, games, and shows for everyone.
*Event dates and times subject to change or cancellation without prior notice. Howl-O-Scream is a separate ticketed event, not included with park admission. Some restrictions apply.

Pin Trading Event
Busch Gardens Pin Trading Event
Trade and explore new and rare pins during a special pin trading event.
Calling all pin traders! Get ready for a special day of pin trading taking place on
Saturday, September 27th Natures Kingdom Gift Shop from 3:00pm - 5:00pm.
For each pin purchased, you’ll have the opportunity to play a game, and then trade from one of our pin trading boards with expansive collections.
Pin Traders must purchase a pin on September 27th and show their receipt to the Ambassador at the Pin Trading game to participate.
Natures Kingdom Gift Shop
3 PM - 5 PM
2025 Pin Trading Event Dates:
Saturday, September 27th Natures Kingdom Gift Shop from 3:00pm - 5:00pm
Saturday, November 22nd TBD
*Event details subject to change and/or cancellation without prior notice.
You may also like
Iron Gwazi
Iron Gwazi takes thrills to new heights, plunging riders from a 206 foot-tall peak into a 91-degree drop and reaching top speeds of 76 miles per hour.
48" min. height.
Roller Coaster
Quick Queue
48" Min. Height
Learn More
Serengeti Flyer
Experience the breathtaking thrill of Serengeti Flyer, the world’s tallest & fastest ride of its kind. Soar higher and higher above the park's expansive 65-acre Serengeti Plain while experiencing multiple negative-G moments.
48" min. height.
Quick Queue
48" Min. Height
Learn More
Phoenix Rising
There’s nothing more exhilarating than a ride on the wings of the phoenix. Experience a fiery blaze of immersive, family-friendly excitement as you soar above the Serengeti Plain and drop into fun-filled twists and turns.
42" min. height.
Roller Coaster
42" Min. Height
Learn More

Special Events & Things To Do
Events for Every Season
You'll always find something fun going on at Busch Gardens. From flavorful food festivals to dazzling Christmas lights, there is always a reason to visit with exciting events for every season. The best part? Many are included free with park admission. All are included with
Membership.
Special Event Lineup
Download & print the Park Schedule and Specials Event Lineup and plan your next visit to Busch Gardens Williamsburg.
Download Schedule
Download the 2026 Park Schedule
Plan your next visit to Busch Gardens Williamsburg with the Park Schedule and Special Event Lineup.
Download Schedule
2025 Events
Busch Gardens 50th Anniversay Sweepstakes
Now - Sept. 14
Celebrate 50 Years of Thrills with a Chance to Win* $50,000!
Learn More
Howl-O-Scream
Select Nights, Sept. 5 - Nov. 2
Take on terrifying haunts and thrills as the sun goes down at this frightfully fun event.
Learn More
ASL Saturdays
Sept. 20
On the third Saturday of every month, guests can enjoy seamless access to Busch Gardens’ popular shows and attractions with live ASL interpreters. Our commitment to accessibility ensures all guests can enjoy Busch Gardens world-class entertainment.
Learn More
Halloween Spooktacular
Saturday & Sunday, Sept. 20 - Nov. 2
Celebrate Halloween with your favorite Sesame Street® Friends with Trick-or-Treating and more!
Learn More
Fiends Frenzy 5k
Sunday, September 28, 2025
Gather your horde of ghastly ghouls for the Busch Gardens Fiends Frenzy 5k!
Learn More
Christmas Town
Select Dates, Nov. 14 - Jan. 4, 2026
Celebrate the holidays with millions of twinkling lights, festive shows, and holiday-inspired culinary delights.
2026 Events
Mardi Gras
Fridays - Sundays + Presidents' Day, Jan. 30 - Mar. 8
Let the good times roll with food, cocktails, entertainment and live music – Mardi Gras style!
St. Patrick's Day Celebration
Select Dates + St. Patrick's Day March 12 - 17
The festivity continues as Irish spirit, luck and celebration fill Killarney village.
Kids' Weekends
Saturday & Sunday, Mar. 21 - Apr. 19
Each weekend brings a new adventure with special appearances in the Globe Theater.
Food & Wine Festival
Thursday - Sunday, Apr. 23 - June 21
Flavors are in bloom at the Food & Wine Festival featuring internationally inspired tastes & sips to savor.
Summer of Wonder
Daily, June 26 - July 30
Explore a summer full of wonder and immerse yourself in the thrills of art, music, culinary delights, and world-class fun.
Bier Fest Brews & BBQ
Friday - Sunday + Labor Day, July 31 - Sept. 7
Sip and savor seasonal brew offerings and new beer-inspired recipes at Bier Fest.
Howl-O-Scream
Select Nights, Sept. 11 - Nov. 1
Take on terrifying haunts and thrills as the sun goes down at this frightfully fun event.
Halloween Spooktacular
Saturday & Sunday, Sept. 19 - Nov. 1
Celebrate Halloween with your favorite Sesame Street® Friends with Trick-or-Treating and more!
Christmas Town
Select Dates, Nov. 13 - Jan. 3, 2027
Celebrate the holidays with millions of twinkling lights, festive shows, and holiday-inspired culinary delights.
Enhance your event experience!
Download our FREE app to enhance your event experience - view showtimes, purchase upgrades, and more!
Want access to this and more?
With a Membership Plan, you can visit our theme park and water park PLUS attend all of our special events (including exclusive Member-only events).
Buy Now

Group Events
Home
Private Events
Youth
Group Tickets
Request Information
Feed Your Curiosity
Busch Gardens Tampa Bay provides a wild and thrilling experience for your group whether you are looking for a company picnic, exclusive park rental, holiday party or meeting space.
Buy group tickets
Request your event
Let Us Help You Plan Your Next Group Event
Find the Perfect Venue
Whether you're planning a business meeting, employee recognition, holiday party, family reunion, church gathering or field trip, we will help you find a great location with customizable packages.
Ask us about our unique settings:
• Gwazi Pavilion
• TreeTop Kitchen
• Exclusive Area Rentals
• Theaters
• Adventure Island
Learn More
Save Online for Groups of  15 - 99
Save time and money by purchasing your group tickets (Single-Day Ticket, Ticket with Meal or Multi-Day Ticket options) online. Just print out your tickets and get ready for a fun-filled day at the park.
This offer is only available for groups of 15 - 99.
Buy Now
Your Event, Our Cuisine—A Match Made on Site
At Busch Gardens Tamp Bay, we specialize in bringing exceptional cuisine directly to your event. Whether it’s a corporate gathering with breakfast and lunch, or an elegant evening reception we craft delicious menus that elevate the experience. From on-site preparation to impeccable service, we ensure every bite is a perfect match for your special occasion. Let us make your event unforgettable with food that’s as remarkable as the moment.

About Our Theme Park
Thrills and nature intersect at our park and provide a hidden adventure for all ages.
Busch Gardens
® in Williamsburg, Virginia is the world’s most beautiful theme park, as voted year after year since 1990. Our theme is classic Europe with artfully landscaped villages, like the Parisian streets of France, the hamlets of Scotland and the Oktoberfest celebrations of Germany. In all, we have nine villages centered around six countries for you to explore.
Park Hours
View park hours to plan your day at Busch Gardens Williamsburg
View Park Hours
Park Map
Find your way to rides, entertainment, restaurants, shops and animal habitats with the park map.
View Park Map
Meet Our Animals
We are a place for learning about wildlife and care deeply about conservation and the animals in our care. You can see and learn about bald eagles, Clydesdale horses and gray wolves.
See Animals
Upcoming Events
From food festivals to spectacular Christmas light displays, there is always something exciting happening at Busch Gardens Williamsburg.
Learn More
Rides & Roller Coasters
Experience thrilling coasters and extraordinary rides for the whole family.
See Rides
FAQs
Learn more about commonly asked questions in preparation for your upcoming visit.
View FAQs
We are nestled near the banks of the James River in Williamsburg, Virginia, which is the perfect place for a family vacation. Surrounded by the Historic Triangle of Colonial Williamsburg, Yorktown and Jamestown, we’re only an hour away from Virginia Beach and Richmond. From farm-to-table dining to activities by the water, this destination has something for everyone.
Hotel Packages
Enjoy lodging, park tickets and more with one of our Packages.
Learn More About Hotel Packages
Plan Your Trip
Make the most of your vacation with these tips and guides.
Plan My Trip Now

Membership FAQs
Take a look below at our frequently asked questions and learn more about the flexible plans and enhanced
benefits our Membership Program offers
.
Want to learn more about your new Membership, like how to redeem and process your Membership?
Learn More
!
Membership Plans starting at only $13.00 per month
Buy Now >
*Blockout dates and restrictions apply.
Membership Program
What do I do after I have purchased my Membership?
Beginning October 1, 2018, Busch Gardens Williamsburg has upgraded the way that you redeem your Membership. You now have the ability save your Membership barcode on your phone, via a
live barcode
or go straight to the gate with your printed confirmation voucher. Once you have received your order confirmation email, you will have three options:
Option 1
: Print the Membership from your home computer and use the printed eTicket each time you visit.
Option 2A
: Download your Membership and proceed to Guest Services if you want to redeem your Membership
BEFORE
you go into the park on your
FIRST
visit.
Option 2B:
After a visit or two to the park, you decide that you do not want to use Option 1 anymore. Please proceed to a self-service ticketing kiosk. Using your printed voucher or electronic voucher.
•
Select Membership Options
•
Scan your barcode
•
Print your Pass
Note
: If you print your card at the park (Option 1), the original barcode number that you were issued via email will be deactivated and the new one will be active.
I lost my printed Membership card. How can I get a new one?
Membership cards and Annual Passes can be reprinted at the self-service ticketing kiosks (Zone B) located at the front of the park.
Note
: If you choose to reprint, your old barcode will be deactivated and a new one will be issued.
When you get to the kiosk, follow these steps to reprint your Membership card.
•
Step 1: Select Membership Options
•
Step 2: Scan or Enter Membership Barcode
•
Step 3: Print your Pass
What is the difference between an Annual Pass holder and a Member
Pass holders are guests with a 1-Park, 2-Park or Platinum Annual Pass. These passes are no longer available for purchase, please note that Annual Passes
do not
receive free access to Christmas Town or Member Benefits & Rewards.
Click here
for Annual Pass holder benefits.
Members are guests who have joined our Membership Program at either the Basic, Unlimited, Premier or Platinum Membership level, which include new enhanced
benefits
that offer more flexibility.
What is the difference between a Platinum Annual Pass and a Platinum Membership?
The Platinum Annual Pass was not sold after February 1, 2018 and is not part of the Membership Program or benefits. Platinum Annual Pass holders will continue to get their current benefits.
Platinum Memberships purchased after October 1, 2018 come with enhanced
benefits
.
See the benefit grid that compares Membership benefits vs. Annual Pass benefits
here
.
Membership Benefits
How do I redeem the double discount for culinary food and beverages?
Platinum Members are eligible to receive one double discount purchase per month for food or beverages at one park of membership starting on Nov. 4, 2023. Platinum Members scan your Membership at a self-service kiosk at the park to print your voucher. Take the voucher to a restaurant to redeem for your discount. The voucher is only valid on day it is printed.
Are there any restrictions on the double discount for culinary food and beverage?
Yes, there are a few restrictions. The double discount is not valid for the purchase of All-Day Dining, All-Day Drink souvenir cups, specialty dines, alcohol, and samplers. This double discount cannot be combined with Busch Bucks or Splash Bucks.
Can I use the double discount on culinary food and beverage purchases at Water Country USA?
Yes, this discount can be used one time per month at one park of membership. Print the voucher from the self-service kiosk at the park you are visiting on the day you plan to redeem.
How do I redeem the additional merchandise discount?
Platinum Members are eligible to receive one additional merchandise discount purchase per month at Busch Gardens Williamsburg at a select store starting Nov. 4, 2023. Platinum Members scan your Membership at a self-service kiosk at the park of redemption for that month to print your voucher. Take the voucher to the selected gift shop for that month to redeem for your discount. The voucher is only valid on day it is printed. This offer is not valid at Water Country USA.
What are the new exclusive experiences for Members?
Unlimited, Premier and Platinum Members will receive new exclusive experiences periodically throughout the year. The best way to find out about these experiences is to
sign up for email
.
How will the reserved seating for Platinum Members work?
Platinum Members are able to take advantage of reserved seating in select theatres. Platinum Members show your Membership to a theater attendant. Seats are available on a first-come, first-served basis.
What is the Platinum dedicated email address for priority access?
Platinum Members can send inquiries to
[email protected]
to receive priority attention.
Are there any restrictions on the additional discount for merchandise?
Yes, there are a few restrictions. The additional discount is not valid for the purchase of specialty merchandise, games, Antique Photo or food and beverages This additional discount cannot be combined with Busch Bucks or Splash Bucks.
What’s the best way to learn about special offers, additional rewards, and Member access to new attractions?
The best way to stay in the know is to sign up to receive Member email communications! Using the same email address associated with your Membership account,
sign up here
to receive our monthly newsletter, special offers, learn how to be among the first to ride new attractions, and more.
How do I redeem my Free Guest Ticket(s) online?
Unlimited, Premier and Platinum Members can redeem your Free Guest Ticket(s) by following these steps below. Please note that each eligible Member in the household will need to log in separately to redeem guest ticket(s). Tickets are valid at park(s) of membership.
Step 1:
Log into your account
using your Member barcode (located on your Pass, it usually starts with the letter “A”) and your billing zip code
Step 2:  Scroll to see your available Free Guest Ticket(s) or Discounted Guest Ticket(s)
Step 3:  Select your quantity
Step 4:  Follow the Checkout instructions
Step 5:  You will receive your Guest Ticket(s) at the end of the purchase via email and thru a “Print and Save” button on the last step. You can print this ticket or save it on your phone.
What if my online account does not show my eligible rewards?
Members can visit the self-service kiosks at the park if they are having issues online redeeming select rewards. Guest tickets and many rewards printed at the kiosk are only valid on the day they are printed. If the reward does not show on the kiosk, please visit a guest service window at the park.
How many Free Guest Tickets do I receive and when are they valid?
With a
Membership Plan
, Unlimited Members receive (3) Free Guest Tickets per year,
Premier Members receive (5) Free Guest Tickets per year, Platinum Members receive
(8) Free Guest Tickets per year, and Water Country USA Unlimited Splash Pass receive
(2) Free Guest Tickets per year to use during select windows.
2025 Guest Ticket Redemption Windows
Platinum Plans (8 Free Guest Tickets per year)
•
Jan. 24 – June 1 (2 tickets)
•
June 2 – Sept. 28 (2 tickets)
•
Sept. 29 – Jan. 4, 2026 (2 tickets)
•
Jan. 23 – May 31, 2026 (2 tickets)
Premier Plans (5 Free Guest Tickets per year)
•
Jan. 24 – June 1 (1 ticket)
•
June 2 – Sept. 28 (2 tickets)
•
Sept. 29 – Jan. 4, 2026 (1 ticket)
•
Jan. 23 – May 31, 2026 (1 tickets)
Unlimited Plans (3 Free Guest Tickets per year)
•
Jan. 24 – Sept. 28 (1 ticket)
•
Sept. 29 – Jan. 4, 2026 (1 ticket)
• Jan. 23 – Sept. 27, 2026 (1 ticket)
Water Country USA Unlimited Splash Pass
• May 10 – Sept. 21 (2 tickets)
The Member must be with the guest to receive their Free Guest Ticket*, which can be used at either Busch Gardens Williamsburg or Water Country USA. Please check if reservations are required before visiting the parks.
Tickets printed via the self-service kiosks at the park must be used by the end date of the free ticket period.
Tickets printed by logging into to member website expire the last day of the issuance window.
*Ticket must be used during the select window and will not be redeemable outside of the given date range. Guests with a Basic Membership can receive Discounted Guest Tickets during select promotional windows. Calendar dates are subject to change. Please check the
operating schedule
prior to your visit to the park.
2026 Guest Ticket Redemption Windows
Platinum Plans (8 Free Guest Tickets per year)
•
Jan 30 – May 31, 2026 (2 Tickets)
•
June 1 – Sept. 27, 2026 (2 Tickets)
•
Sept. 28 – Dec. 31, 2026 (2 Tickets)
•
Jan. 29 – May 31, 2027 (2 Tickets)
Premier Plans (5 Free Guest Tickets per year)
•
Jan. 30 – May 31, 2026 (1 Ticket)
•
June 1 – Sept. 27, 2026 (2 Tickets)
•
Sept. 28 – Dec. 31, 2026 (1Ticket)
•
Jan. 29 – May 31, 2027 (1 Ticket)
Unlimited Plans (3 Free Guest Tickets per year)
•
Jan. 30 – Sept. 27, 2026 (1 Ticket)
•
Sept. 28 – Dec. 31, 2026 (1 Ticket)
• Jan. 29 – Sept. 27, 2027 (1 Ticket)
Water Country USA Unlimited Splash Pass
• May 9 – Sept. 20, 2026 (2 Tickets)
What are Monthly Member Rewards and how do I get them?
Monthly Member Rewards
are included with Basic, Unlimited, Premier and Platinum Memberships. Each month has exclusive offerings only available to Members.
Most rewards can be accessed at the self-service ticketing kiosk located at the front of the park.
•
Select Membership Options
•
Scan or Enter Membership Barcode
•
Select Membership Rewards
•
Choose the Reward of Choice
What are Bonus Tickets?
Bonus Tickets are free tickets available to Basic, Unlimited, Premier and Platinum Members as an extra pop-up Member Reward occasionally during select windows. Check the
monthly rewards calendar
online for updates.
Note
: Bonus Tickets are in addition to the Unlimited, Premier and Platinum Members Free Guest Tickets.
Is free parking included with Membership plans?
A parking benefit is included with Unlimited, Premier and Platinum Membership plans.
Unlimited:
Free General Parking; Preferred Parking Discount
Premier:
Free Preferred Parking (based on availability)
Platinum:
Free Preferred Parking (based on availability); 1 Free VIP Parking per Year
Do I get a discount on Preferred Parking with the Membership plan?
Members with a Premier and Platinum Membership get free Preferred Parking when available at the Virginia parks. Members with Unlimited Plans may purchase Preferred Parking at a discounted rate, as long as it’s available.
Do I get a discount on food and merchandise in the park?
Yes.
Effective September 6, 2022 the following discounts will apply for Busch Gardens & Water Country USA:
Platinum Memberships
: 30% photo prints & frames discount. 30% merchandise discount. 20% dining discount.
Premier Memberships
: 20
% photo prints & frames discount. 2
0% merchandise discount. 15% dining discount.
Unlimited
:  1
0%
photo prints & frames discount.
1
0% merchandise discount. 10% dining discount.
Basic
: 5
%
photo prints & frames discount.
5
% discount on merchandise.
(No dining discount for Basic Membership).
Select
add-ons
may include these savings. To learn more about your available discounts and offers,
log on
to the website with your Membership information, stop by the Self-Service Ticketing Kiosks or visit any cashier window at the park.
Do I get Discounted Guest Tickets with Membership plans and Annual Passes?
Discounted Guests Tickets are valid at Busch Gardens Williamsburg or Water Country USA during select promotional windows.
Members may access Discounted Guest Tickets via our website or at the park(s):
Login to our website
in the
Quick Access to Your Offers & Discounts
section
Enter
membership barcode
(14-16 digits starting with the letter "A") along with the
zip code
associated with your account
Once you have successfully logged into the member site, click on the
Discounts
tab and your Discounted Tickets will be on the page
You will need to
Enter the quantity of Discounted Tickets to the Cart
and continue through the checkout process
Visit our Self-Service Ticketing Kiosks located at the front of the park(s).
Select Membership Options
Scan or Enter Membership Barcode
Select Membership Rewards
Choose the Discounted Ticket
My Membership includes admission to Busch Gardens Williamsburg. Does it get me into Howl-O-Scream and Christmas Town?
Yes, it certainly does. With a Membership, you get admission to all of our park
events
like
Summer Nights
and
Food & Wine Festival
, too. Plus, access Member-only Events like Sneak Peek Days or Member Days. You can visit the park on any
regular operating day
that the park is open.
Note
:
Blockout dates
still apply to guests with Basic Memberships. Separate ticketed events at our sister parks are not included with Platinum Memberships.
Why does the Basic Membership have blockout dates?
Each Membership plan offers varying benefits. The Basic Membership Plan was designed for guests who are flexible and looking for maximum savings.
What are the Basic Membership blockout dates?
These are dates where admission is not included with your Basic Membership Plan.
View our blockout calendar
for more information.
If I purchase a Basic Membership and want to visit the park on a blockout date, do I have to purchase a full-priced admission ticket?
We have a special discounted rate for Basic Members to visit on
blockout dates
that can be purchased at Guest Relations on the day of your visit.
If I have an Annual Pass, what benefits will I receive?
As long as your Annual Pass is active and in good standing on EZpay, you will continue to receive the benefits that are currently associated with your Pass including admission to the designated park(s), free parking, and in-park discounts.
Compare Annual Pass benefits vs. Membership benefits.
Note:
Free Guest Tickets, Member Rewards, Sneak Peek Days and Member-only Events are only available with the Membership Program.
Your Options
How can I find out which Membership option best fits my needs?
Please visit our
Membership Benefits page
to review the best plan for you and your family.
Want to modify your current Membership plan?
If you decide that you want to change or upgrade your current Membership plan, you can do one of two things:
1
. Visit the parks’ cashier window (Zone A) on any
regular operating day
2
. Call
(757) 229-4386
by phone
Note
: If you have paid in full, you must visit the park to change or update your current Membership plan.
How Do I Join?
How do I purchase a Membership?
The best way to join the Membership Program is to
purchase online
.  You can also visit the parks’ cashier windows (Zone A) on any
regular operating day
to purchase or call
(757) 229-4386
to enroll by phone.
How do I switch my Annual Pass to a Membership plan?
If you are in good standing on EZpay, you can visit the cashier windows (Zone A) on any
regular operating day
or
call (757) 229-4386
to switch to a Membership plan. This transaction
is not
available online and must be exchanged in person or by calling our Guest Assistance Team.
Payment Options
What is EZpay?
EZpay is an interest-free monthly payment program designed to make a Membership fit easily into your budget for as long as your Membership is active. There is a 12-month initial commitment and then your Membership will automatically renew on a month-to-month basis (at a new rate based upon the then current retail price of the plan you initially selected), subject to your right to cancel at any time following the 12-month initial commitment period. You are not required to purchase your Membership on EZpay. If you prefer, you may pay for your Membership in full at initial time of purchase.
Do I have to get on the EZpay monthly payment plan?
You are not required to purchase your Membership on EZpay, however EZpay is an interest-free monthly payment program designed to make a Membership fit easily into your budget for as long as your Membership is active. There is a 12-month initial commitment and then your Membership will automatically renew on a month-to-month basis (at a new rate based upon the then current retail price of the plan you initially selected), subject to your right to cancel at any time following the 12-month initial commitment period. If you prefer, you may pay for your Membership in full at initial time of purchase.
Is EZpay available for all Membership plans?
All plans have the EZpay options except for the Water County USA Unlimited Membership plans. The Water Country USA plan must be paid in full.
Will my monthly rate change?
Your monthly rate will not increase during the initial 12-month commitment. After that, each month you will be charged the out of commitment price as noted in your contract at time of purchase.
If I currently have an active Pass on the EZpay monthly payment plan, can I cancel without penalty and become a Member?
Yes, you can cancel without penalty when moving to Membership. On your next visit, simply visit the parks' cashier windows (Zone A) on any
regular operating day
to purchase or call
(757) 229-4386
to enroll by phone.
Your EZpay commitment starts over once you switch to a Membership plan.
Do you guarantee my monthly rate will not change?
Price Lock Guarantee is no longer available with the new Membership program. Your rate will not change within the first 12-months of your commitment. After the initial 12-month commitment, each month you will be charged the out of commitment price as noted in your contract at time of purchase. If the Membership rate increases, you will receive notice of that increase before your credit or debit card is charged.
Platinum Membership Benefits
What is the difference between a Platinum Annual Pass and a Platinum Membership?
The Platinum Annual Pass was not sold after February 1, 2018 and is not part of the Membership Program or benefits. Platinum Annual Pass holders will continue to get their current benefits.
Platinum Memberships purchased after October 1, 2018 come with enhanced
benefits
.
See the benefit grid that compares Membership benefits vs. Annual Pass benefits
here
.
What is the Single-Ride Quick Queue benefit and how do I take advantage of this as a Platinum Member?
The Single-Ride Quick Queue is an exclusive benefit that allows Platinum Members to enjoy priority access to an attraction of their choice, once per operating day. This benefit can be used at participating attractions*:
Alpengeist
,
Apollo’s Chariot
,
Verbolten
,
Griffon
,
Tempesto
,
Invadr
,
Finnegan's Flyer
,
Pantheon
, and
Lock Ness Monster
. DarKoaster and The Big Bad Wolf: The Wolf’s Revenge are not included with the Single-Ride Quick Queue benefits.
How To Redeem
Visit our Self-Service Ticketing Kiosks (Zone B) located at the front of the park(s).
Select Membership Options
Scan or Enter Membership Barcode
Select Membership Rewards
Choose Single-Ride Quick Queue
Bring the printed voucher obtained from the Self-Service Ticketing Kiosk to the qualifying attraction of your choice and present the voucher to the Ambassador before entering the Queue Line.
*Attraction availability may vary based on seasonal events, operating hours, date of visit, and weather. Other restrictions may apply. Please view the
Rides
page for attraction availability.
Where can I use my Free Guest Tickets?
Guest Tickets can be used at Busch Gardens Williamsburg or Water Country USA only.
What rides are included in the Single-Ride Quick Queue Access benefit for Platinum Members?
If you are a Platinum Plan Member, one of your benefits includes one Single-Ride Quick Queue per visit on your choice of the following attractions*:
Alpengeist
,
Apollo’s Chariot
,
Verbolten
,
Griffon
,
Tempesto
,
InvadR
,
Finnegan's Flyer
,
Pantheon
and
Lock Ness Monster
. DarKoaster and The Big Bad Wolf: The Wolf’s Revenge are not included with the Single-Ride Quick Queue benefits.
*Attraction availability may vary based on seasonal events, operating hours, date of visit, and weather. Other restrictions may apply. Please view the Rides page for attraction availability.
As a Platinum Member one of my benefits includes a free PhotoKey subscription. What is PhotoKey?
PhotoKey
is a great way to collect your in-park photos digitally from rides and photo locations throughout the day and then share memories.
Locations include:
•
Adventure Photo (Main Gate)
•
1-2-3 Smile with Me!
•
Highland Stables
•
Select rides
•
Christmas Town photo opportunities
Note
: PhotoKey is only available at Busch Gardens Williamsburg. It is not valid for use at Antique Photo or Photos of Christmas Past.
How do I access my PhotoKey subscription?
As a Platinum Member, your PhotoKey subscription will be issued as a Member Reward at the self-service ticketing kiosk (Zone B) located at the front of the park.
•
Select Membership Options
•
Scan or Enter Membership Barcode
•
Select Membership Rewards
•
Choose the PhotoKey Subscription
Do I get my Platinum benefits when I visit the other 9 SeaWorld Parks and Entertainment locations?
If you purchased your Platinum Membership from Busch Gardens Williamsburg, you will receive parking and in-park discount benefits at all non-Virginia parks.
Full Pay Auto Renew (FPAR)
Why did my Membership automatically renew?
For your convenience, your Membership was set up for automatic renewal at the time of your purchase. Based on the payment agreement, it would renew automatically at your one-year anniversary unless you canceled beforehand.
What amount will be charged to my card when it automatically renews?
When you purchased your Membership, both the “Total Price” you paid initially (including any sales or discounts) and the “Recurring Annual Payment After Initial Term” to be charged on your anniversary would have appeared on the agreement.
Will my Membership price go up each year it renews?
After your initial 12-month commitment, you will be charged the Recurring Annual Price that was listed in your payment agreement when you purchased. For any additional price increases, you will receive notice before your credit or debit card is charged.
Do I still receive the same benefits when my Membership automatically renews?
When you are in your initial term, you will keep your existing benefits and rewards through the end of the term. Upon renewal, your Membership would grant you the current benefits and rewards based on your tier (Basic, Unlimited, Premier and Platinum) and parks.
f I have an FPAR (Full Paid Auto Renew) Membership, will I see new Free Guest Tickets on my anniversary date?
Yes, as a FPAR Member, you will see your guest tickets replenished on your anniversary date. These tickets will follow the current ticket usage calendar.
Review your account for current rewards.
How do I manage my account?
You can manage your account and update your debit and credit cards online with our EZpay management system.
Step 1
:
Log in
with your username and password or create an account with your Membership
• (NOTE: a barcode/zip code login does not provide sufficient security to manage your EZpay account)
• If you already have an account, click “add your Pass” once logged in to update your account with Membership(s) desired.
Step 2
: Click on the “EZpay” tab
Step 3
: On the left side, after a listing of your EZpay Memberships, you’ll see a link to update your card (among other helpful options)
Step 4
: Click the link to update your card information and then enter the desired information on the following screen

park hours
for dates and times, events for available offerings and More Details on products for additional information. You may also
contact us online
or visit the Welcome Center inside the park.

optimizely global snippet

Make the Most of Your Membership
We’re glad to have you as part of the Busch Gardens Williamsburg Membership family! You can feel good knowing you’re saving up to $2,355* on tickets, parking, and more. Because we love our Members and want you to get the most out of your experience throughout the year, we’re sharing a few tips to help you maximize every moment!
Set up an Online Account
Your online account will allow you to see many of the offers and rewards available to you throughout the year. You can also purchase discounted upgrades, including animal encounters and tours, all-day dining deals, and Quick Queue to get you to the front of the lines faster!
Stay in the Loop
Sign up for email using the same email address you used when you purchased your Membership. You’ll receive emails about exclusive Member offers and be the first to know about upcoming events!
Check out the Member Rewards page and monthly Member News blog for new rewards and other exclusives added throughout the year.
Claim Your Rewards
After setting up your account, you can log into the Member portal to redeem select rewards. Certain ones like Busch Bucks, PhotoKey, and some others can only be redeemed at a self-service kiosk at the park.
At the kiosk, select “Membership,” scan or type your active Member barcode, select “Rewards,” choose your desired reward or ticket promotion, and follow the on-screen instructions. Park tickets are entry-ready, while other rewards and giveaways will require you to follow the redemption instructions on the printed voucher.
Keep Your Membership Handy
You can print a paper wallet-size Member card at the self-service kiosk, use a printed paper voucher of your Membership purchase, or save your Membership on your phone.
Another option is to purchase a physical card at the park for $7 and a portion of the sale is donated to the SeaWorld Conservation Fun, which supports helping ocean environments through scientific research and educational programs.
Redeem Your Free and/or Discounted Guest Tickets
If you purchased an Unlimited, Premier, or Platinum Membership, your free guest tickets can be redeemed during select date windows based on your Membership tier. Check out the
guest ticket redemption calendar
to find out when.
Discounted guest tickets are offered promotionally throughout the year. When available, guest tickets can be redeemed or purchased online via the Member portal, at an in-park self-service kiosk, or at a guest service ticket window.
Insider tip:
Before your first visit, download our
Busch Gardens mobile app
for access to park hours, interactive maps, mobile food ordering, and more!
If you still have questions, be sure to check out
these FAQs
for more information. Thank you again for becoming a Busch Gardens Williamsburg Member. We look forward to helping you create wonderful memories this year!
*Based on the value of a Platinum Membership, savings may vary based on Membership Tier.
